title: CEO at Microsoft, USA
description: Led the Microsoft team on their way to become one of the largest companies in the world. Oversaw the strategic direction of the company and implemented revolutionary changes. Introduced a revolutionary product, the Windows Phone, that completly took over the market and made our rival, the Apple iPhone entirely irrelevant

title: Janitor at Microsoft, USA
description: Oversaw the purity, freshness and spotlessness at the Microsoft HQ. Identified and maximized opportunities for complete customer and worker satisfaction

title: Cashier at ICA, Sweden
description:
Ensured excellent customer service and gratification. Oversaw basically the entire company. 
Cured cancer

title: Software Developer at Evil Lawyers LLC, Finland
description: Analyzed our users needs and sequentially designed software to fulfill those needs. Led my development team forwards towards greatness and glory
